If you are thinking of getting it don't. The lower rank wait times are 40-50 minutes EASY for a killer and if you don't play enough, when rank reset happens (MONTHLY), you will find yourself back in the lower ranks struggling to find matches. The game also has major balancing issues with matchmaking. No reason new players should be matched against top tier players. It has ruined this game. Sorry BHVR, but you've had time to fix this and you haven't.

UPDATE 19 Sep 2021:

Game is still terribly balanced and not fun for lower levels. BHVR FINALLY decided Pay-2-Win was a good idea with the new killer who fundamentally breaks the game and is stuck behind a literal pay wall. Pinhead's chains make the game unplayable.
Actualmente, yo, no se lo recomendaría a nadie, pero haz lo que quieras con tú dinero, que para eso es tuyo.

Как же меня задолбала эта игра. На момент написания рецензии наиграл 40 часов, но это нереально, игре уже почти 3 года а она до сих пор в бета тесте, я не загружаюсь на четверть всех игор просто потому что игра зависает и начинаеться без меня, преимущественно тогда когда я использовал подношение. К самому игровому процесу претензий у меня нет, но как же бесят все баги и лаги,  здесь за выжившего получить по шее от убийцы проще чем зайти в саму игру, и я не шучу здесь может прилететь даже если для тебя убийца физически не мог тебя достать. И еще не знаю к кому обращяться потому что не нашел никакой тех-поддержки но у меня уже 3-тий раз слетают сохранения. Просто откатываються на несколько лвл-ов персонажи, при этом очки крови (одна с валют для прокачки) остаються такими же и это нереально бесит, я знаю что их не так уж и сложно добыть, да и подношений потом будет навалом но я не хочу жить в этой игре, а если бы выше перечисленых проблем не было то и злиться не пришлось бы.

Great game for what it is. The devs have been great at keeping it fresh with new content and characters, although it can get very confusing for new players. Don't let that scare you, it is very easy to get going. Great value with loads of hours of entertainment.

I recently bought this game..

I't is very different from any other game I have played, and I have had many hours of fun playing it.
Hopefully many more to come.

This review is based on 556 hours of gameplay.

Very horrible game regarding optimization and balance but unbelieveably addictive. If you want to enjoy this game, don't go past rank 10. As a rank 1 survivor and killer, red ranks are even worse than hell. 

Solo Q as survivor at rank 1: at the beginning of the game usually 1 DC immediately, 1 DC after being downed for the first time, and if you are lucky, killer will be friendly and let you and your living teammate go. Otherwise enjoy free depip and stress and anger and frustration. Killers are usually camping assholes that don't actually know how to play the game, they just got to rank 1 because of ULTRA EASY ranking system and because they run into very altruistic survivors that don't do gens at all, they just want to farm BP for WGLF. Very rare you see an actual good killer with talent for the game. On the other hand, your teammates are as stated above, overly altruistic,  can't hit skillchecks, they go down in 15 seconds, don't repair gens, make stupid plays and so on. DON'T PLAY RANK 1 IF YOU DON'T HAVE DECENT SWF TEAM.

Playing killer at rank 1 : Now is 2019. Devs finally decided to fix the lobbies so now it is actually possible to get survivors instantly. However, survivors you go against are 80% 4 man SWF, and the other 20% of time you get solo survivors in the lobby that are actually RANK 1! AND THEY KNOW HOW TO PLAY. On very rare occasion, survivors in your lobby are noobs. Start of the match: If you are lucky, Hex:Ruin will last 1 minute instead of half a minute and in that time if you don't down at least 1 survivor the game is practically over. Group will start to genrush and all gens will be done in less than 5 minutes, EVEN IF THEY AREN'T SWF, BECAUSE YOU GO AGAINST DECENT SURVIVORS. Everybody knows how to loop the pallets, juke, use jungle gyms and so on. If you play anyone else than Nurse or Hillbilly, prepare to depip and get frustrated even more than when playing a survivor. Huntress was also good before, but now people have learned to counter her too well and it is really hard to play at rank 1 with her now. 

The game itself : UNBALANCED AS HELL
I don't want to go into details, if you ever reach rank below 5, you will know what I am saying. 

The game is full of various bugs and they can really ruin the experience of the game. With every new patch there are more and more of them. But devs, instead of fixing them all, they fix only about 10% of them every patch, but then there are 10 more bugs than before. Also, instead of putting more effort into fixing and optimizing their game, that is very badly optimized, devs make a lot of new skins which require a lot of time. I understand that game has to make money somehow, but still there is to many skins, and TOO MANY BUGS THAT ARE NOT BEING FIXED.

In this current state, I wouldn't recommend the game because of toxic community and all, but the game is very addictive and will keep you for at least 100 hours of gameplay, unless you reach rank 1 before that and get proxy/face camped for 10 games in a row or get teabaged by 4man swf at the exit gate. So my advice is to stay at rank 10 and enjoy the game.

Full Definition of gravity

1a: dignity or sobriety of bearing
a person of gravity and learning

b: IMPORTANCE, SIGNIFICANCE
especially : SERIOUSNESS
the gravity of the offense

c: a serious situation or problem

2: WEIGHT

3a(1): the gravitational attraction of the mass of the earth, the moon, or a planet for bodies at or near its surface
(2): a fundamental physical force that is responsible for interactions which occur because of mass between particles, between aggregations of matter (such as stars and planets), and between particles (such as photons) and aggregations of matter, that is 10-39 times the strength of the strong force, and that extends over infinite distances but is dominant over macroscopic distances especially between aggregations of matter
— called also gravitation, gravitational force

— compare ELECTROMAGNETISM sense 
2a, STRONG FORCE, WEAK FORCE

Еще один шедевр в моем списке замечательных игр, которые я рекомендую. 
Основные плюсы:
1. Цена. Совсем символическая.
2. Атмосфера. Испытываешь животный страх, аж поджилки трясутся.
3. Геймлей. Можно забить на команду и спастись самому, или же помочь своим друзьям по выживанию и попытаться спастись вместе. В первом случае меня мучает совесть и я всегда пытаюсь помочь, от этого мне становится еще интереснее играть.
4. Геймдизайн. Очень детально и красиво построены локации, я, как зарекомендовавший себя с лучшей стороны эстет, испытываю настоящее удовольствие, на уровне с сексуальным. Возможно, я извращенка. 
5. Звуковое сопровождение. Сердцебиение в игре сливается с моим воедино. Шорох и любой шум заставляет постоянно оглядываться. Чувство загнанного зверя.
Я однозначно рекомендую эту игру, и ко мне стоит прислушаться любителям хорроров, мистики, триллеров. Почему? Потому что я с самого детства интересуюсь исключительно хоррор-индустрией, фильмы, игры, иногда даже музыка, иллюстрации. Для себя я точно и ясно понимаю, что дер*мо, а что нет, и так же стараюсь поделиться только годнотой со своими единомышленниками. 400 рублей - просто ничто, по сравнению с эмоциями, которые вы испытаете.

Only buy this game if:

a) You are looking for a casual experience;
b) You have friends to play with.

If any of the above don't apply to you, just avoid this piece of disappointment.

When you'll start playing, you'll be at a very low rank. Thanks to the recent changes, most players will be sitting at mid-to-high ranks at all times; this means that you'll have to wait ages to find a game and, when you do, you'll be matched with and against people a lot more experienced than you. This also happens to very high rank survivor players.

At the earlier ranks, killers are very strong as they generally are much more intuitive to play with; once you actually learn of this game works though, you'll quickly find out how much of an advantage survivors have and the entire game's balance will break. Killer games at higher rank are immensely frustrating and survivors are boring to play (you like to hold M1?), unless you play with friends - but, to be fair, ANY game is better with friends, so what's the point?

On the other side of the spectrum, killers have some tactics to make their job easier (usually referred to as camping, tunneling and slugging by the community). They work when used properly, but they are VERY frustrating for the receiving survivor. This is a design issue and the developers can't fix it - sometimes they release a "fix" which all it does is nerfing killers somehow, but really doesn't address the underlying issue.
The survs will then blame the killer for using them, leading to an overall less enjoyable experience for everyone - but, for real, don't blame the killer, BLAME THE GAME.

All of this without even mentioning the outstanding amount of bugs, netcode issues and disconnects (both on purpose and from crashes) from people in-game and the general toxicity of the community.

The only things keeping this game (barely) alive are the on-license killers which attract attention and the recently added Archives (which are just an overly complicated battle pass to keep you hooked with limited time rewards and arbitrary, game breaking *jobs* to complete).

I love playing DbD despite the salty player base however I won't ignore that it DOES have issues.

Balance does often come into question especially on the killers side as a rank 1 survivor and a peak rank 7 killer i can say it is considerably harder as a killer to win a game. 

Also after hitting rank 1 i see no incentive to carry on playing survivor as losing just one game will make you de-rank as they removed the pip slots at rank 1 a while back.

Also prepare to spend alot of time looking for a good connection lobby (hopefully this is solved with dedicated servers in August)

There are also many bugs that arrive with each new patch and it feels that each patch breaks more than it fixes.

Despite this DbD is a very fun game even more so with friends and i would recommend it for anyone who either like's survival horror games or to anyone who thinks they need more salt in their diet.

Impossivel jogar isso... Alem de demorar horas pra encontrar partidas, quando encontra é um host que te deixa com 300+ de ping, te forçando a sair da sala e entrar na procura novamente. E as partidas? Assassinos OP... Muito normal vc ja iniciar o game apanhando por começar exatamente ao lado do assassino. Fora que tudo que vc precisa fazer no game demora ANOS... Gerador com carregamento extremamente lento (ou nem carregam pq vc precisa neutralizar algum totem perdido pelo mapa antes), enquanto que assassinos te derrubam em um só golpe, isso quando o assassino não te mata no chão mesmo... Procedimento de curas também parece que levam uma eternidade! Enquanto isso, assassinos se teleportando ou andando invisível no mapa com uma mobilidade superior a dos sobreviventes. Concluir qualquer objetivo nisso será IMPOSSÍVEL enquanto nao houver um balanceamento dos assassinos! Acham que pelo time de sobreviventes ser composto por 4 pessoas está balanceado contra o assassino? Experimenta entrar pra jogar e ver um sobrevivente te salvar exatamente na frente do assassino e vc ser levado 2x seguidas pro gancho a troco de nada... Isso quando o assassino nao fica camperando seu corpo, impossibilitando o resgate.
Se eu pudesse pegaria meu dinheiro de volta.

友達同士ワイワイ対戦して親指を立てて、
バグの多さと一部ユーザーのマナーの悪さに中指を立てるゲーム

※2019/5/23 追記
当方はサバイバーとして遊ぶ事の方が多い、サバイバー・キラー共にプレイするユーザーです。

突然ですが、ホラー作品の花形とは何でしょうか？
魅力的な武器？違います。カッコいい・可愛い主人公？惜しいですが違います。
ホラー作品の花形、つまりその作品を盛り上げる最も重要な要素は
『恐怖の対象』なのです。

2018/12/14　リージョンという新キラーが実装されました。
決定打に欠けるが時間をかけて必ず対象を仕留め倒す、使っても使われても『弱った獲物を執拗に狙うただのチンピラ』という印象で、どこか憎めないキャラでした。

2019/5/23　ごく最近、そのリージョンに調整が入り本実装に至りました。
結果、個人的な使用感を述べさせて頂くと
『三輪車に乗って、ただひたすらみね打ちを繰り返すヒルビリーの様なキラー』になりました。

過去にもキラーが酷く不利になる状況は多々ありました。
ナースがブリンクでテレポートすれば地下に吸い込まれ、トラッパーが罠を仕掛ければ宙に浮きサバイバーからも丸見えになる･･･
しかし、これらはあくまで『バグ』であり、予期せぬものであり、後に修正されています。(実際この2つのバグは現在見かけません。)
ですが今回のリージョンは調整した結果、仕様として実装されたものであり、バグでも何でもありません。
個性が完全に潰され、サバイバーよりほんの少し足が速い『だけ』のキラーとして、1対4の勝負を強いられるのです。

キラー1：サバイバー4で遊ぶゲームなので、割合としてサバイバー専門で遊んでいるユーザーの意見が大きく聞こえるのは無理からぬ事ですが、そこはスタッフとして中立な立場で精査し開発・調整をお願いしたい所です。

何だか真面目にレビューを書くのもバカバカしくなって来ました。
このゲームを遊ぶよりCivilizationを遊んだ方がやっぱり良いんですかね？スタッフさん？
また色々アップデートがあれば再度レビューを編集するかもしれません。

総論：現状ではとても人にオススメ出来るゲームではありません。

Steam needs a maybe option. Only get this game if you have friends.

This game can be fun but is pretty tedious. The Devs keep this updated in a way that adds beneifts but creates bugs, and they continue to add new things without fixing these bugs while simultaneously creating new ones. Bitter sweet really.

The saving grace of this game is really that it's great with friends, I've had quite a bit of fun with many groups of people and made new friends through mutuals, streams, and the occasional random who is decent. But do not play this by yourself, as the community is mostly pretty toxic, and about 50% of the player base are hackers while stating they are using perks to see you, which is a lie (Most hackers will say they had "NOED" to see you when it 100% doesn't) or speed hackers.

Edit: Don't bother, as they've been adding content but also making it easier for killers to play unfairly. Even now, issues that could be reported for griefing or just toxic gameplay is no longer available, and partially encouraged to be a schmuck to either your teammates or your victims. This has made for about 8/10 killers playing like a 6 year old because they know now that they can get away with it.

There's something about this game I can't get enough of. Even after all these hours, it makes my heart race and makes me jump. The developers keep adding new content and seem to always be trying to improve the game. I definitely recommend this game for anyone who enjoys the horror genre.

Eu sinto uma enorme tristeza tendo que escrever está análise, pois é mais um jogo da minha lista de favoritos que cai por água abaixo por culpa dos Devs.

Dead by Daylight costumava ser meu jogo favorito, era maravilhoso. Jogar de assassino era incrível, você sentia aquele poder maravilhoso e controle do mapa, ser o vilão em Dead by Daylight era uma experiência muito boa. E jogar como sobrevivente? Era tão bom quanto se você tivesse um amigo que sempre jogasse contigo por que sozinho era um SACO. O jogo atualmente tá num estado deplorável, cada capítulo novo é pior que o outro com raras exceções, com o do Resident Evil por exemplo, onde os personagens e perks introduzidos foram maravilhosos. O jogo conta com diversos problemas que me fazem crer que ele não vale o preço original, então se quiser, compre em sale. Filas enormes pra rank alto, latência enorme muitas vezes, pareamento desbalanceado, e falta de criatividade por falta da equipe que cria os capítulos são só alguns do que eu consigo citar de cabeça.
Great game, highly recommend
Excellent game with hours worth of replayability and fun! Extremely highly recommend!

This has turned into a bad game.

I purchased this game shortly after release and had a lot of fun with it. I have come back now to new over powered characters and perks and would now never reccomend this game to anyone.

- Killers can jump over windows now. This was one  of the main ways It would allow me and other noobish players to escape from the killer but now the killer can also jump over windows and still keep a visual on you.

- Jigsaw killer reversed bear traps that he puts onto you are a joke. This guy downs me 1 time then puts a mask on me and i'm expected to run around the entire map looking for the key inside these dumb machines. I'm a huge fan of the saw franchise but this killer is to op

- Michael Myers is to fast

- Freddy puts me in a dream state and I have no idea where the fuck im going

All these new DLC killers are to op

- The perks make the DLC killers even more op
I get paired up against killers that are like max level and they find me instantly. I could go hide in a random closet or crouch behind a tree and these killers know where I am no matter what due to the perks.

-Not enough free content for the survivors. Most of the time you are probably playing as a survior, yet i'm still wearing these bum ass clothes and get like budget haircuts to choose from. Dev's release Michael myers, texas chainsaw massacre dude and the pig mask saw character but i'm still wearing these bumy ass jeans and sweater, not enough content. I bought the game but i'm expected to drop more money if I want to wear something half decent. 

-The free killers are underpowered compared to the DLC killers. What am i expected to do with garbage bear traps.. 1 person can have the trap perks on and completely counter what your killer is supposed to specalize in, trapper my ass.
These free killers are so trashy, I purchased the game and this is all I get? I'm expected to buy dlc to get on a even playing field? I bump into the odd guy like myself who only has the free killers and it's so hard to win a match and kill ALL survivors. Try using the trapper then switch to legion.

- When I bought the game is was all good, we were all on a even playing field. Now everyone has dlc killers.  Now I feel robed of my money, apparently all my cash got me was the base game, if you want a way more enjoyable experience you have to be willing to drop more cash. By the way the price of 1 killer is the same price of buying a a half decent game on steam, what they are asking to way to expensive.

(Update) I've given this game so much time and effort, hours of practice, sleepless nights just wasting time away on this game. This game is honestly a joke.. killers are almost unfair to play against, teams are usually trash unless you're playing SWF (Survive with friends)

(Original) Wouldn't recommend it right now, even though i really want to. When I first heard of this game I absolutely loved the idea of a survivor outplaying a killer or vice versa, it's a lot of fun. With that being said there's a lot of downsides to this game.
 When you first get the game you load in to find you have many choices of survivors and killers that have specific skills you need to survive or kill efficiently. Many of the top rated skills are spread out among all the characters which means A LOT of grinding, also bringing me to my next point. I actually love to grind in video games, however it's a little difficult to play the game when you as a newbie are put up against people that clearly out level and out rank you. The matchmaking system leaves MUCH to be desired and honestly just doesn't make any sense. You also have to watch out for the killer's (Host) ping and make sure he isn't lagging so you can get some decent gameplay. On top of that the game crashes in the loading screen half the time and wastes any of the rituals you spent your hard earned bloodpoints on.
 In conclusion I really want to recommend this game because its addicting and you might have a lot of fun, however i just wouldn't recommend paying for this. If you're the type of person that gets upset easily and throws a keyboard often over dumb plays or crazy lag spikes then you might be buying A LOT of keyboards...
